== Ubuntu Sudan ==
''This is the wiki page of the Sudan Local Community Team''

We aim to provide free community support to users of the various flavours of Ubuntu.

This group is for anyone in the Sudan who uses or is interested in Ubuntu. 

=== How to join ===

1. Create a <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki> account. 

2. Join our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~sudan/+join|Ubuntu Sudan]]</nowiki> team. 

3. Subscribe to the Mailing list to stay in touch with us.

4. You can also join Facebook Group <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/Ubuntu.Sudan.Team/|Ubuntu Sudan Team]]</nowiki>

=== How to Contribute ===

Write with us for the next generation.

=== Useful links ===

1. <nowiki>[[http://askubuntu.com|Ask Ubuntu]]</nowiki>

2. <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Alternatives|Ubuntu alternative softwares]]</nowiki>

3. <nowiki>[[http://www.omgubuntu.co.uk/|OMG Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
